info.title: Support API service
info.description: This service acts as an orchestrator for information coming from different services and as a proxy

parameters.name: institutionId
parameters.description: The internal identifier of the institution

parameters.name: brokerId
parameters.description: The internal identifier of the institution

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order to show response NONE, ASC, DESC

get.summary: Gets institutions filtering by taxCode and/or subunitCode
get.description: Gets institutions filtering by taxCode and/or subunitCode

get.summary: Retrieve user's information including product role details
get.description: Fetches detailed information about users associated with a specific institution, including their roles on various products. This endpoint is useful for administrators to obtain comprehensive user-role mappings within an institution.

get.summary: Retrieve user information by userId and optional ProductId
get.description: Retrieves user given userId and optional ProductId
Performs for every product a count of relative onboarding notifications sent
Service to retrieve a contract given institutionId and productId

post.summary: The service adds users to the registry if they are not present and associates them with the institution and product contained in the body
post.description: The service adds users to the registry if they are not present and associates them with the institution and product contained in the body

get.summary: Service to retrieve tokens from product's identifier
get.description: Service to retrieve tokens from product's identifier

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Token's status. Available values: REQUEST, TOBEVALIDATED, PENDING, COMPLETED, FAILED, REJECTED, DELETED

post.description: Service to retrieve user info including institutions and products linked to him, this service retrives 100 institutions at most

get.summary: Get onboardings by institution taxCode, subunitCode, origin, or originId.
get.description: Returns onboardings record by institution taxCode/subunitCode/origin/originId

put.summary: Complete onboarding without verifying contract signature.
put.description: Perform complete operation of an onboarding request as /complete but without signature verification of the contract

put.summary: Update onboarding request with new values.
put.description: Update onboarding request receiving onboarding id.Function can change some values.

get.description: Service that allows to get a list of UserGroup entities

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to access (0 indexed, defaults to 0)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of records per page (defaults to 20, max 2000)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property(,asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: If filter on status is present, it must be used with at least one of the other filters

Problem.title: Problem

detail.description: Human-readable description of this specific problem.

instance.description: A URI that describes where the problem occurred.

invalidParams.description: A list of invalid parameters details.

title.description: Short human-readable summary of the problem.

type.description: A URL to a page with more details regarding the problem.

Problem.description: A "problem detail" as a way to carry machine-readable details of errors (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7807)

role.description: Available values: MANAGER, DELEGATE, SUB_DELEGATE, OPERATOR, ADMIN_EA

onboardedInstitutions.description: Object that includes all info about onboarded institutions linked to a user

user.description: Object that includes all info about a user

userEmail.description: User's email linked to the institution

number.description: The number of the current page

createdAt.description: Date on which the group was created

createdBy.description: User by which the group was created

members.description: List of all the members of the group

modifiedAt.description: Date on which the group was modified

modifiedBy.description: User by which the group was modified

bearerAuth.description: A bearer token in the format of a JWS and conformed to the specifications included in [RFC8725](https://tools.ietf.org/html/RFC8725)
